title: The Essence of AI
content: AI is not just a tool; it's a mirror reflecting our own data back to us. The question isn't 'What can AI do?', but 'What should we do with AI?'. When we look at Large Language Models, we are seeing the law of scale in action. Quantity becomes quality. But we must not lose sight of the essence. Why are we building this? If we don't ask 'Why', we will be buried by the 'How'.

title: Sovereign AI Strategy
content: Korea is too quiet. We need a sovereign AI strategy. Relying solely on foreign models is akin to losing our digital territory. We must secure our own foundational models to ensure our culture and language are preserved in the digital age.
